metadata.name: Suspicious Cobalt Strike DNS Beaconing - DNS Client
metadata.comment: Detects a program that invoked suspicious DNS queries known from Cobalt Strike beacons

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND metadata.event_code = 3008 AND (startswith(lower(query.hostname), lower('aaa.stage.')) OR startswith(lower(query.hostname), lower('post.1')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('.stage.123456.'))))

output.summary: Detects a program that invoked suspicious DNS queries known from Cobalt Strike beacons
